paper_metadata.title: Community-driven development and poverty reduction in rural Burkina Faso

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Various efforts by national governments, non-governmental organizations (NGOs) and international donors have shown limited success in reducing poverty in sub-Saharan Africa
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: An analysis of the literature on poverty reduction programs in Burkina Faso has revealed that the various national and international programs did not have any significant effect on reducing poverty

evidence_citations.country_citation: This paper focuses on poverty reduction programs in Burkina Faso
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: This paper focuses on poverty reduction programs in Burkina Faso and argues that a community-driven approach to development and poverty reduction has the potential of lifting rural populations out of poverty trap
